findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The _approve function is private but can still be accessed by anyone, allowing unauthorized approval of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function does not have any access modifiers or checks, making it vulnerable to unauthorized transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function does not have any access control or validation, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of token swaps.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The 'swapAndLiquify' and 'addLiquidity' functions are private but do not have any access modifiers or reentrancy protection, making them vulnerable to unauthorized access and potential reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The constructor function lacks access modifiers, allowing anyone to re-initialize the contract.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected deliver function
findings.description: The 'deliver' function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function is public and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInReward function
findings.description: The includeInReward function is public and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferBothExcluded function
findings.description: The _transferBothExcluded function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _reflectFee function
findings.description: The _reflectFee function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _takeLiquidity function
findings.description: The _takeLiquidity function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected removeAllFee function
findings.description: The removeAllFee function is private and lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to call it.
